full_summary:
# TSPS - Evaluation and Statistical Performance Review of PA Policy

## Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)

### Contract Information

* **Reference Number:** PW-23-01022188
* **Solicitation Number:** 30002646
* **Publication Date:** 23 January 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** 8 February 2023, 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Date:** 25 January 2023

### Contractor Information

* **Contracting Authority:** Fisheries and Oceans Canada
* **Contact Person:** Glauco Santos, email: Glauco.Santos@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
* **Address:** 200 Kent Street, Station 13E228, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0E6, Canada

### Tender Description

This Request for Proposal (RFP) seeks the services of one or more senior fisheries science analysts to evaluate and statistically review the technical elements of Fisheries and Oceans Canada's (DFO) "A Fishery Decision-Making Framework Incorporating the Precautionary Approach" (PA Policy, DFO 2009a).

The successful Bidder will provide an evaluation and statistical performance review of the PA Policy, incorporating data across diverse species life histories and assessment paradigms. The review should consider international best practices in sustainable fisheries management under the precautionary approach.

The proposed period of contract will run from contract award to 31 March 2025. Eligible suppliers must be Supply Arrangement (SA) holders under E60ZT-18TSPS, qualified for Tier 1 in categories 2.9, 2.12, or 2.13.

### Trade Agreements

The contract is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

### Attachments

The tender documentation is available
